title: Drawing, "Garden with Classical Buildings and a Fountain", 1743
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor, over black chalk on white laid paper
signed: Signed in pen and brown ink, urn at lower left:  Moucheron fecit/1743
provenance: Tobias Christ; Armin B. Allen, Inc., New York City
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of the Port Royal Foundation
description: Imaginary classical setting.  Fountain in pool at center of composition.  Three upside-down entwined dolphins support central jet.  Behind, on left and right, two reclinging figures with urns of water pouring into the pool.  Surrounding the pool are symmetrical arrangements of trees, terraces, and classical buildings.  Two female figures stand on terrace at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Garden with Classical Buildings and a Fountain", 1743.
1743. Pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor, over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of the Port Royal Foundation. 1986-8-1.
